page.title: 12CHURCHES NEAR HORRABRIDGE
page.content: There are three main types of churches in and around the study area, they are {Church of England, Methodist,}and {Roman Catholic}The first two of these are to be found in Horrabridge.While {Roman Catholics}have to travel to {Yelverton or Tavistock}to worship. {St.John's church}is used by the{Church {of England}for two services a week each last about an hour and about 50 people attend.There is a{Sunday School for children.Most{Catholics}in {Horrabridge}travel to{Yelverton}for a 2 hour service on Monday,Wednesday,or Sunday.Around about a 100 people normally attend.Methodists have 2 services a week in the village. The {congregation}is approximately 30 and the service lasts for 1 hour.
